Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAdmin
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAdmin"
ClearCookie SOAP Command

Clear cookie

Authorization token required false
Admin Authorization token required false - always allow clearing

ClearCookieRequest

    <ClearCookieRequest> ## ClearCookieRequest
        (<cookie name="..." /> ## CookieSpec)*
    </ClearCookieRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <ClearCookieRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/cookie Optional (0 or more) Specifies cookies to clean
/cookie@name Required (only 1) Type:String

ClearCookieResponse

    <ClearCookieResponse /> ## ClearCookieResponse
